General.Name: BYD Company Limited
General.Description: BYD Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in rechargeable battery and photovoltaic, handset components and assembly, and automobile businesses worldwide. It operates through Rechargeable Battery and Photovoltaic Business; Mobile Handset Components and Assembly Service; and Automobiles and Related Products segments. The company manufactures and sells lithium-ion and nickel batteries principally for mobile phones, electric tools, and other portable electronic instruments and photovoltaic products; mobile handset components, such as housings and keypads; and automobiles, and auto-related moulds and components, as well as provides assembly services. It also provides IT products, including plastic components, metallic parts, hardware electronic products, mobile phone keystrokes, micro-electronic products, LED display screen module, photoelectron products, flexible circuit boards, chargers, connectors, UPS, DC power supply, solar products, mobile phone ornaments, mobile phone ODM, mobile phone testing, and mobile phone assembly products, as well as the ODM, manufacturing, assembly, and testing of laptops. In addition, the company offers auto products, such as various fuel cars, auto parts, dual mode electric vehicles, pure-electric vehicles, etc.; and new energy products comprising solar power stations, power storage stations, electric vehicles, LEDs, electric forklifts, etc. Further, it designs, produces, and sells integrated circuits, solar batteries, and solar arrays; provides after-sales services; and rents electric vehicles, as well as engages in taxi business. BYD Company Limited was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
